text: Andriy Dmytrovych Nikitin (; born 8 January 1972) is a retired Soviet and Ukrainian professional footballer. ==References== ==External links== * * * Nikitin at allplayers.in.ua Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Luhansk Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Metalurh Donetsk players Category:FC Shakhtar-2 Donetsk players Category:FC Metalurh-2 Donetsk players Category:FC Mariupol players Category:Simurq PIK players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Andriy Nikitin
